original_title: Learn Blues Guitar With 6 Great Masters!
overview: Six great lessons from the masters of blues guitar: Lesson 1: Arlen Roth Lesson 2: Lonnie Mack Lesson 3: Ronnie Earl Lesson 4: Duke Robillard Lesson 5: Buddy Guy Lesson 6: Harvey Mandel
title: Learn Blues Guitar With 6 Great Masters!
